description: This is a tool for software developers. It's not pretty and it's not easy to use, but it is the best D-Bus debugger I'm aware of and it's made my life easier on several occasions. Recommended.
The D-Bus inspection tool of choice. Belongs in every Linux developer's toolbox.
summary: A must-have tool for every serious Linux developer

description: This is the ideal tool for working with D-Bus. It makes it easy to understand, fix and implement D-Bus APIs.
